title: Cannot join a Game
body:
Hey there, i have a Problem.

If i start a Game in League i can't join it i don't even get into loading screen. Games just starts and doesn't open the Loading Screen and on the Client i can click on Reconnect but nothing happen.

Can someone Help me?

replies.body: This can happen if your network is blocking you from connecting to the game server.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix that up.  I recommend doing it in a custom game though!
My network is fine there its not blocking the connection to your servers. I did played yesterday and Today this just happend. I changed nothing on my Computer so why it should it block now?
Could be an auto update with your OS, antivirus, or something else.  The steps in the guide will help to rule out most common possibilities.
